name: B.O.R.G. - Basic Organic Recall Game
blurb: Before Robots Saved The Galaxy, They Played B.O.R.G.

rewards.reward:
One of Nine...

For a mere $0.01 per day, less than a gumball, you can help entertain a robot for a year.  We won't even show you pictures of horribly deformed robots left to fend for themselves to find lubrication and electricity.

Get your name listed in the B.O.R.G. credits as a recipient of a Non-accredited Earthling Robot Doctorate degree.  Make all of your friends call you Doctor from now on!

Also access to the B.O.R.G. Beta for what that is worth.

These poor defenseless machines need your help.  Please pick up your mouse and donate today.

Two of Nine...

For the price of a really tasty pizza, you can bring joy to an android.

In addition to your name in the credits, we will send you (2) physical copies of Eight, A Dice Strategy Game, our previous game.  

Plus access to the B.O.R.G. Beta.

Look at your ever expanding gut.  You really don't need that pizza.  Plus you can burn 6 calories an hour rolling dice!

SHIPPING TERMS
USA $8
International $20

Three of Nine...

As a being with a love for non beings, you deserve something special.  And for the price of a fine bottle of bourbon to drink your human sorrows away, we're going to put your name in lights!

Your name will appear as a sponsor of B.O.R.G. matches!  Everyone who donates on this level can submit their name.  At the beginning of each game, the computer will randomly select a name and that person will sponsor the game!  Imagine people from around the world seeing your name  as an avid supporter of Electro-mechanical lifeforms throughout the universe whenever they play B.O.R.G.!  As The Kinks remind us, cellular heroes never really die!

And just in case, you bump into some social miscreant who has never played B.O.R.G. we'll give you a B.O.R.G. t-shirt to wear in front of him and make him jealous.

And as if you care at this point, you also get you name listed in the credits and 2 copies of Eight sent to you.

And you get to play the Beta of B.O.R.G. like that matters now that you are a celebrity.

Man we wish we were you.....

SHIPPING TERMS
USA $8
International $30

Four of Nine...

Logically, there is no reason not to spend the price of one crappy, top of the arena, puked on by the guy behind you, concert ticket to Whitesnake & Def Leppard to support the absolute derth of robotic entertainment choices.

As a person who think like a robot, you see the inherent value of getting (4) copies of Eight, (2) B.O.R.G. T-shirts, your name as a sponsor, in the credits and having full access to the B.O.R.G. Beta.

Emotion is overrated.  Logic is what gets the Fem-Bots all oily.  Show them your logical side and give us $64.

SHIPPING TERMS
USA $8
International $30

Five of Nine...

Ok, we know there are a lot of things you can do with $128.  
-You could buy 128 double cheeseburgers at McDonalds and have cardiac arrest.
-You could cash it in for 12,800 pennies and build a 70.718 lb statue out of them. (If you were a robot you'd know that there are 181 pennies per pound when calculating with pennies made since 1982...stupid humans)
-You could play 512 games of Asteroids.  Wait, that would be more fun than B.O.R.G. so forget that.

In any case you have options.  And one of those options is to donate the $128 to us! And in exchange we will send you a custom made B.O.R.G. 16GB Flash drive to save all your own memories.  And need we even mention that flashing a custom made USB drive based on a game is the ultimate Babe/Dude Magnet.

And because you are such a player, we'll toss in the (4) copies of Eight, (2) B.O.R.G. T-shirts, the name sponsor thing, & access to the Beta just in hopes you will mention us to the ladies.

SHIPPING TERMS
USA $15
International $17

Six of Nine...  Your commitment to the superior race is commendable.  To give you quicker access to our world we are going to send you a 120 GB Internal Solid State Drive.  You also get everything listed at the $128 level.  Just don't tell the humans.  Those suckers are still using hard drives!

SHIPPING TERMS
USA Free
International $30

Seven of Nine...  Since we have not tested the Jeri Ryan prototype for home use, we can't offer you the real 7 of 9.  However, what we can do is make you twice as cool as that luke warm supporter of silicon life below you at the $256 level, by sending you a 240 GB Internal SSD drive.

Oh, and that would be in addition to the 120 GB Internal SSD drive, the (4) copies of Eight, the (2) T-shirts, the name sponsor deal, and access to the Beta.  So you may actually be 3 times as cool as him.  Our mistake.

SHIPPING TERMS
USA Free
International $30

Eight of Nine...  BORG ME!!!  For the human that has everything, there is only one thing left.  To be turned into a half robot, half human, sci-fi masterpiece!  We're going to give you everything at the $512 level, but we are going one step further.  Send us a picture of someone, and our artist will turn them into a half human, half android BORG.  And then will stick your futuristic face in the game so everyone can see what you will look like 200 years from now when they play!
You'll be dead, but we will capture your image such that you'll be just as ugly then as you are now.  Your innate ability to scare off small children and small domesticated animals with a simple glance will be preserved for all eternity. 
SHIPPING TERMS
USA Free
International Free

Nine of Nine...  Silly Human.  Trips are for kids...   But like most Organics it appears that you have more money than sense.   Besides putting your face in the game with a BORG ME reward, and everything at the $500 level, there is really only one thing left to do for a robot game lover like you.....Send you on a trip for two to Spiel 2013 in Essen Germany (Oct 2013) , the world's largest game convention, for four days of gaming goodness.  That would mean two round trip airline tickets out of NYC area to Dusseldorf Germany, hotel accommodations in Essen, tickets to the show, and a special night out on the town with the development team.


While we can't bring you with us this year, we would LOVE to bring some people to SPIEL 13. We want this to be the ultimate gamer vacation for you and your companion.  Your travel arrangements will be booked once the dates for Spiel 13 are set (early in 2013).  

If you happen to be going to Spiel 12 this year, feel free to stop by our booth to test the latest beta of B.O.R.G. (hopefully), as well as some other treats we are working on for 2013!
